title: Comment from Danny de Gracia II

analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule rightly quotes the previous Biden administration citation that Schedule F undermines the foundations of the civil service and its merit system principles, which were essential to the Pendleton Civil Service Reform Act of 1883’s repudiation of the spoils system.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its potential to undermine civil service protections and merit-based principles, while also expressing concerns about the politicization of the civil service and the loss of institutional knowledge.
